name: Creative Labs GigaWorks T40 Series II 32 W Speakers
Features: [3-Driver audiophile configuration: Improve overall sonic spectral balance for music that sounds fuller, warmer and more faithful to the original source., Woven glass fiber cone driver: Experience rich, clear midrange audio and a broader sound stage., Cloth dome tweeter: Hear crisp, detailed highs with a dedicated tweeter., BasXPort technology for enhanced bass: Enhance the low frequency response without the bulkiness of a subwoofer., Convenient access: Get the bass, treble and volume you want with the easily maneuvered controls., Hear it on the big screen: Connect the speaker system to your TV or gaming console and enjoy solid audio entertainment.]
